attributes.action: FLY ENGLANDS NATIONAL FLAG OF ST GEORGE AT ALL TIMES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ENGLANDS NATIONAL FLAG OF ST GEORGE SHOULD BE FLOWN ON ALL GOVERNMENT BUILDINGS,OVER ALL COUNCIL OFFICES SCHOOLS UNIVERSITIES AT ALL TIMES  & IF NECESSARY BESIDE THE UNION FLAG. AFTER ALL ENGLAND SHOULD BE PROUD TO FLY HER OWN NATIONAL FLAG JUST AS CUBA,FRANCE,CHINA RUSSIA & THE USA ARE NOT ASHAMED OR BACKWARD IN FLYING THEIR OWN NATIONAL FLAGS.WOULD'NT IT BE SOMETHING TO FLY YOUR OWN COUNTRIES FLAG WITHOUT FEAR OF PERSECUTION OR THREAT FROM RIDICULE .ENGLANDS FLAG MUST BE REPRESENTED AT ALL TIMES IN PUBLIC & PRIVATE LIFE.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
